welcome_message_body: Welcome to Edogawa, Japan! Get ready to explore our charming city known for its beautiful riverside views, traditional festivals, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Edogawa has to offer.

restaurants.name: ベーカリーレストラン MARUKO
restaurants.description: ベーカリーレストラン MARUKO is a yoshoku restaurant located in 江戸川区.

restaurants.name: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 環七一之江店)
restaurants.description: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 環七一之江店) is a ramen restaurant located in 江戸川区.

restaurants.name: Kairikiya (ラーメン魁力屋)
restaurants.description: Kairikiya (ラーメン魁力屋) is a ramen restaurant located in 江戸川区.

restaurants.name: Tonkatsu Den (とんかつ 田)
restaurants.description: Tonkatsu Den (とんかつ 田) is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 江戸川区.

restaurants.name: Syabu-Yo (しゃぶ葉 小松川西店)
restaurants.description: Syabu-Yo (しゃぶ葉 小松川西店) is a shabu-shabu restaurant located in 江戸川区.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Haneda Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal opened in 2015, primarily used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be found on signs throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yokota AFB Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
